attributes.action: Reinstate a Senior Matron to overhall Hospital procedures & cleanliness
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bring back the traditional roll of a Matron in our hospitals,so as to get them back to the hygenic position they were once, and get rid of all the Managers and their staff, so that there's enough money to employ more Doctors and Nurses.
